page.title: 14LOCAL GOVERNMENT-HARMBY AREA
page.content: THIS AREA IS USUALLY A TORY STRONGHOLD BUT IN THE LAST ELECTIONS A LIBERAL CANDIDATE WON THE SEAT FOR THIS AREA TO EVERYONES SURPRISE.THIS AREA IS ADMINISTRATED BY THE NORTH YORKSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL.HARMBY AND SPENNITHORNE ARE IN THE RICHMONDSHIRE AREA OF THE COUNTY.HARMBY HAS A PARISH COUNCIL BUT SPENNITHORNE HAVE A PARISH MEETING TWICE A YEAR.THE PARISH COUNCILLORS REPRESENT THE VIEWS OF THE ELECTORATE TO COMMENT ON PLANNING APPLICATIONS TO THE DISTRICT COUNCIL AND ALSO TRY AND LOOK AFTER THE WELL- BEING OF THE VILLAGE.THERE ARE FIVE PEOPLE NOMINATED FOR ELECTION EVERY FOUR YEARS BUT THEY ARE NOT PAID.THE NEAREST POLICE STATION IS IN LEYBURN ONE MILE AWAY.CRIME IS RARE IN THE AREA APART FROM THE USUAL DRIVING OFFENCES AND THE OCCASIONAL BURGLARY.
